name: part_005
file: tmp_【#AZKi新ビジュアルお披露目】4th Anniversary Live ＂Pages＂ 活動4周年記念ライブ【ホロライブ⧸AZKi】 [SrUT9pCLlcY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: A retrospective transition sequence showing key dates and previous character models of AZKi over her four-year journey.
AZKi performs her song 'afterglow' on a stage with a sunset backdrop, showcasing her new 4th-anniversary visual.

subtitles.original: この夜を明かそうよ
subtitles.english: Let's pass this night

subtitles.original: 苦しまず済むんだア
subtitles.english: You won't have to suffer

subtitles.original: せめて君を覚える　ココロを　取り戻す
subtitles.english: At least regain the heart to remember you

subtitles.original: え　どうして　何も言わないの
subtitles.english: Eh, why don't you say anything?

subtitles.original: 偽りの言葉を　捨てて
subtitles.english: Cast away those false words

subtitles.original: afterglow / 作詞:AZKi / 作曲:AZKi, 中川大二郎 / 編曲:中川大二郎
subtitles.english: afterglow / Lyrics: AZKi / Composition: AZKi, Daijiro Nakagawa / Arrangement: Daijiro Nakagawa

subtitles.original: もう　行かなくちゃいけない
subtitles.english: I must go now

subtitles.original: 長く遠い道の終わり
subtitles.english: The end of a long, distant road

subtitles.original: 静かに眠ったおでこを合わせて
subtitles.english: Pressing our foreheads together as you sleep peacefully

subtitles.original: 深く息をした
subtitles.english: I took a deep breath

subtitles.original: 見上げた先には　赤い空
subtitles.english: Looking up, there's a red sky

subtitles.original: きっと同じ空を見ているのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're looking at the same sky

subtitles.original: 胸に残る
subtitles.english: Remaining in my heart

subtitles.original: あなたの　あなたの　あなたの声が今
subtitles.english: Your voice, your voice, your voice now...

subtitles.original: 今夢に落ちて　夢で覚める
subtitles.english: ...now falling into a dream and waking up in a dream

subtitles.original: あなたの　あなたの　あなたの記憶今
subtitles.english: Your memory, your memory, your memory now...

subtitles.original: 私を置いていく
subtitles.english: ...leaves me behind

subtitles.original: ほら　幸せなことは
subtitles.english: Look, the happy things...

subtitles.original: すぐに消えてしまう予定
subtitles.english: ...are destined to vanish soon

subtitles.original: あんなに好きだった景色も雲も
subtitles.english: The scenery and clouds I loved so much...

subtitles.original: 色褪せてしまった
subtitles.english: ...have faded away

subtitles.original: 今を生きていくこと
subtitles.english: Living through the now...

subtitles.original: 一人ひたすら走ること
subtitles.english: ...and running alone as hard as I can

subtitles.original: 私という存在は脆くて
subtitles.english: My existence is so fragile...

subtitles.original: その足動かない
subtitles.english: ...that my feet won't move

subtitles.original: 見上げた先には　灰の空
subtitles.english: Looking up, there's a gray sky

subtitles.original: ちゃんと色を取り戻せるように
subtitles.english: So that I can truly regain the colors

subtitles.original: 世界の真ん中
subtitles.english: In the middle of the world

subtitles.original: あなたの　あなたの　あなたの声が今
subtitles.english: Your voice, your voice, your voice now...

subtitles.original: 今　こだましてる
subtitles.english: ...is echoing now

subtitles.original: あなたの　あなたの　あなたの欠片今
subtitles.english: Your fragments, your fragments, your fragments now...

subtitles.original: 今　私は探してる
subtitles.english: ...I am searching for them now

subtitles.original: 胸に残る
subtitles.english: Remaining in my heart

subtitles.original: あなたの　あなたの　あなたの声が今
subtitles.english: Your voice, your voice, your voice now...

subtitles.original: 今空に溶けていく
subtitles.english: ...is melting into the sky now

subtitles.original: あなたの　あなたの　あなたの記憶今
subtitles.english: Your memory, your memory, your memory now...

subtitles.original: 今　私を忘れていく
subtitles.english: ...is forgetting me now

subtitles.original: きっとよかった
subtitles.english: It was surely for the best

subtitles.original: これで最後
subtitles.english: This is the end
